ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Prepare for another nerf... =8^P
ygData.msgSnippet: *snip haste stacking bug being fixed* Not a poke at you specifically, Olgwinn, just an observation. I was reading the Concert Hall board last night.  Why are
ygData.messageBody:
*snip haste stacking bug being fixed*

Not a poke at you specifically, Olgwinn, just an observation.

I was reading the Concert Hall board last night. Why are people so
upset about this being fixed? It has historically been referred to as
the "haste bug" and everyone was hoping they wouldn't find it. Well,
its been found and fixed. It was never intended to work that way and
everyone (well, a lot of people anyway) knows it. We ask them to fix
bugs, and when they do we get upset? "No, no, not *that* bug!" A bug
is a bug. Bugs should be fixed. Maybe now that its fixed, part of
our overhaul will be to take a look at our haste songs. Could happen.

[49 Bard] Robynn Merrilin (Wood Elf) <Disciples of Honor> ZONE: E'ci

--
Katy Westerman
katy-w@...
Don't lick something unless you really mean it.
-Advice from the Naked Dancing Llama
